extendedInfo.description: True Bearing is a simple app that displays orientation and distance from your current location to some point-of-interest  (a runway, a dive spot, a geocache, the 9th green, etc) using Google maps and your mobile device's GPS & internal compass.  A point-of-interest (POI) can be selected using the map, entered using latitude and longitude, set from your current location, or recalled from memory.Possible uses include: aviation, diving, golf, hunting, and geocaching. Set a POI from your current location when you park and use True Bearing to find you car later.FEATURESâ¢ Tracks your current location and the current true heading of your android deviceâ¢ Select a point-of-interest (POI) using Google maps, by entering latitude and longitude explicitly, or from your current locationâ¢ Allows one to save a recall POIsâ¢ Displays in street mode or satellite view modeâ¢ Displays distance in: feet, yards, meters, kilometers, miles, or nautical milesRECENT CHANGESFor v0.7.1â¢ Several bugs were fixedâ¢ General stability enhancements were implementedFor v0.7.0â¢ The ability to save and recall POIsâ¢ Various auto-fit modes to help position and scale the map.â¢ A new GUI that enables one to easily:  - Set the POI from your current location  - Bring up the lat/log POI dialog  - Center and Fit the current bearing on the screen  - Save and recall POIsâ¢ Various other small change

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is the best navigation tool I\'ve seen great app.  to make it better add mariner navagation charts then ill rate 5 stars
reviews.author: Andrew Hatala

reviews.title: Bearing
reviews.comment: Don\'t understand this.  It\'s called bearing but doesn\'t give you the bearing of where you want to go.  Can\'t find an app that does mind you so maybe it\'s not possible.  Would have thought it was just maths?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
reviews.comment: This app works perfectly. You can save a location, then navigate DIRECTLY to that spot (the shortest distance) from anywhere. Surely there are other apps that do this, not so sure they\'re as simple.
reviews.author: William Heffernan

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I use this aplication to aling my  ham radio antenna.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GREAT APP
reviews.comment: WORKS FLAWLESS ON HTC INSPIRE USING ATT.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GPS fix takes long time
reviews.comment: I have a motorola Droid bionic.  I have used the app while up on a tower with clear line of sight to GPS satellites.  However, it takes forever and sometimes never locks on to satellite to give position making it extremely difficult to use the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says, well done
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Primative, but useful.
reviews.comment: This application does the job. Would be nice with a few features. Onscreen UI for gps input, recentering map, and confirm btn instead of back btn.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty cool..impressed works well on my droid 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant... Pretty accurate and haven\'t found any bugs. Need to make a \"my location\" makes my fingers tired from swiping all the way back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the idea, but doesnt work to well. Set location to current spot, moved a couple of meters away, and was unable to find way back using gps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RF engineer
reviews.comment: A good and useful tool during my RF measurement work. It will be nicer if it can support csv or kml file import function such that a large amount of POIs can be easily imported. It is a very painful experience to manually type coordinations of POIs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good concept needs more work
reviews.comment: Easy to set points but compass doesn\'t work so its kind of useless as a GPS point locator  Needs a simple add point to favorites feature and height from current location as well as distance from
reviews.author: Michael Seton

reviews.title: Casidimus
reviews.comment: Awesome tool for hunting and hiking. Helped me out of woods when turned around
reviews.author: A Google User
